snippet.title: Unmasked: An Inner Journey – Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM 
s.team/a/2726050

Unmasked: An Inner Journey is an emotion-driven adventure platformer where you play as a manifestation of a mind fighting inner fears and painful memories. As you delve into the Craftsman’s consciousness, you will help him accept his past, ultimately finding closure.

The story of Unmasked: An Inner Journey is told without words, through a series of carefully crafted vignettes hinting at events from the Craftsman’s past. Unmasked: An Inner Journey blends action, puzzles, and chase sequences to achieve it. You will fight creatures that eerily resemble your hero, use wind gusts and giant machines to overcome various obstacles and confront monsters that guard the deepest secrets of the Craftsman’s psyche.

Releasing Q4 2024
Follow us on Twitter/X: x.com/1stone_games
